Field Detail

RATE_LIMIT

static final int RATE_LIMIT
All API calls (with the exception of stats) are rated limited at 150 calls per hour. In the future, we will offer whitelisting by request. When making unauthenticated calls, each request counts against the total made by the calling IP address; when authenticating, calls count against the authenticated user's limit. You may request rate limiting stats at api/v2/stats (it won't count against your total). Your limit resets each hour.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

stats

org.json.JSONObject stats()
Returns stats about your API usage. Note: does not count against your rate limit.

Returns:
JSON response containing: rate_limit, calls_made

Parameters:
emailOrUsername - Email/Username
password - Password
Returns:
JSON response containing: token

Parameters:

Returns:

userPosts

org.json.JSONObject userPosts(int id,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options)
Returns a user's posts by User ID

Parameters:
id - User ID
options - is a map & can contain: type [optional] Post type (code, snap, link, question) limit [optional, default = 10, max = 25] number of posts to return per page after [optional] if given, return posts with an ID lower than after
Returns:
JSON response containing: posts [{ id, tiny_id, post_type, post_url, created_at, updated_at, user { ... }, published, public, title, url, content, description, formatter_description, like_count, comment_count, snaps { mega_url, keith_url, large_url, medium_url, small_url, thumb_url, original_url } }]

userPosts

org.json.JSONObject userPosts(java.lang.String username,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options)
Returns a user's posts by Username

Parameters:
username - Username
options - is a map & can contain: type [optional] Post type (code, snap, link, question) limit [optional, default = 10, max = 25] number of posts to return per page after [optional] if given, return posts with an ID lower than after
Returns:
JSON response containing: posts [{ id, tiny_id, post_type, post_url, created_at, updated_at, user { ... }, published, public, title, url, content, description, formatter_description, like_count, comment_count, snaps { mega_url, keith_url, large_url, medium_url, small_url, thumb_url, original_url } }]

postsShow

org.json.JSONObject postsShow(int id)
Return data about a single post by Post ID. Note: For questions, content is the question. For code, content contains the code snippet. For code, snaps, and links, description is the post description; it is not used for questions.

Parameters:
id - Post ID
Returns:
JSON response containing: id, tiny_id, post_type, post_url, created_at, updated_at, user: { ... }, published, public, title, url, content, description, formatted_description, like_count, comment_count, tag_string, tags [ ... ]

postsShow

org.json.JSONObject postsShow(java.lang.String tinyId)
Return data about a single post by Post Tiny ID. Note: For questions, content is the question. For code, content contains the code snippet. For code, snaps, and links, description is the post description; it is not used for questions.

Parameters:
tinyId - Post Tiny ID
Returns:
JSON response containing: id, tiny_id, post_type, post_url, created_at, updated_at, user: { ... }, published, public, title, url, content, description, formatted_description, like_count, comment_count, tag_string, tags [ ... ]

postsAll

org.json.JSONObject postsAll()
Returns a list of all posts in reverse-chron order

Returns:
JSON response containing: posts [{ id, tiny_id, post_type, post_url, created_at, updated_at, user: { ... }, published, public, title, url, content, description, formatted_content, formatted_description, like_count, comment_count, snaps { mega_url, keith_url, large_url, medium_url, small_url, thumb_url, original_url } }], page

postsAll

org.json.JSONObject postsAll(int after)
Returns a list of all posts in reverse-chron order after given ID

Parameters:
after - [optional] if passed, only return posts posted after this ID
Returns:
JSON response containing: posts [{ id, tiny_id, post_type, post_url, created_at, updated_at, user: { ... }, published, public, title, url, content, description, formatted_content, formatted_description, like_count, comment_count, snaps { mega_url, keith_url, large_url, medium_url, small_url, thumb_url, original_url } }], page

postsList

org.json.JSONObject postsList(java.lang.String postType,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options)
Returns a list of posts of a given type

Parameters:
postType - Post type (code, snap, link, question)
options - Map containing sort [optional, default = recent] Sort by recent, popular, best (staff picks) page [optional, default = 1] Page of results to return
Returns:
JSON response containing: posts [{ id, tiny_id, post_type, post_url, created_at, updated_at, user: { ... }, published, public, title, url, content, description, formatted_content, formatted_description, like_count, comment_count, snaps { mega_url, keith_url, large_url, medium_url, small_url, thumb_url, original_url } }], page
